page.title: 09 THE BALMORAL.
page.content: The Balmoral is situated in a quiet village called Little Ingestre. It is a hotel and a restaurant but the hotel can only accomodate 6 people because of fire regulations. They also have a fully licensed wine and and spirits bar and can only be used by anyone over 18, but children are allowed into the restaurant area. The Balmoral can be used for wedding receptions, birthdays and other such occasions when live entertainment can be provided. They serve most foods including Steak and Roast meat.An average meal costs about $10. Drinks served include Wines, Gin and Tonic, Whisky and beer. There is also a garden for serving meals in the summer. The Balmoral opens from 12-2pm and 7.30-9.30pm. They are open Monday-Sunday.
